metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5873 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in the __ns_get_path function in fs/nsfs.c in theLinux kernel before 4.11. Due to a race condition when accessing files, aUse After Free condition can occur. This also affects all Android releasesfrom CAF using the Linux kernel (Android for MSM, Firefox OS for MSM, QRDAndroid) before security patch level 2018-07-05.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5873` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-164-generic - 4.4.0-121.145~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-121.145~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-lowlatency - 4.4.0-121.145~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-powerpc-e500mc - 4.4.0-121.145~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-powerpc-smp - 4.4.0-121.145~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-powerpc64-emb - 4.4.0-121.145~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-powerpc64-smp - 4.4.0-121.145~14.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-164-generic - 4.4.0-121.145~14.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-164-lowlatency - 4.4.0-121.145~14.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1054-aws - 4.4.0-1017.17
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1059-azure - 4.15.0-1023.24~14.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-grouper: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').

linux-lts-xenial package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-121.145~14.04.1').
linux-aws package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1017.17').
linux-azure package in trusty/esm, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1023.24~14.04.1').
